message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.  To make this easy, I'm starting the price at $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm looking for. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
